backend/main.mo: Main canister handling storage mixins, access control setup, and types plus state for chatrooms, messages, users, and reactions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module initializing new access control state from an old actor structure.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file with cache‑busting meta tags and script versioning for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app defining routes, layout, 404 handling, and theme provider using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog for selecting avatars via uploads or Giphy search with debounced requests and update handling.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Chat UI handling message list, auto‑scroll, sending messages, replies, and pinned video display.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with media thumbnails, live status, and fetched previews for Twitch and Twitter content.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a dialog for creating chatrooms with fields for topic, media uploads, video URLs, and Twitter embeds.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the app header with navigation, username editing, and avatar selection.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Placeholder component that returns nothing since authentication is not used.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders chat messages with reactions, timestamps, media previews, and tweet embeds.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Handles message entry, file uploads, video/Twitter URLs, and optional voice recording.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video with an option to unpin it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty or placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React audio player with waveform visualization, playback controls, and synced state updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Forces a fresh chatroom refetch on actor readiness by clearing stale cache and triggering recovery.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and persistent identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines chatroom and message queries/mutations using the backend actor with local storage helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles, theme variables, mobile fixes, and custom voice message slider styling.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Formats numbers using compact k/M/B notation.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from the Giphy API and map results into a simplified GIF structure.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Implements client‑side image compression with resizing, quality control, and progress reporting.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed data to produce safe preview objects with caching and request deduping.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter preview objects with validation and expiration handling.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Extracts video IDs and thumbnail URLs for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter and includes URL detection utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin UI for authenticating with a password and viewing or deleting chatrooms using React Query.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a chatroom by ID, handles loading/error states, increments view count once, and renders ChatArea when data is ready.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a searchable/filterable list of chatrooms with category filters and a create-dialog toggle.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, anonymization plan, backend payload issues, and pending backend fix requirements for getChatrooms.
